name: Ostrich Racing 3D Simulator
description:
Do you love to Ride a Ostrich? Devbatch presents 3D Ostrich Racing game. Its not like a simple Ostrich racing game but full action packed high addictive Ostrich racer game. You can play either with other Ostrich riders to compete all racing missions or Play single like a Ostrich Cart simulator game. You can jump or dodge the obstacles in the fierce competitions.

In this 3D Ostrich cart race challenge game you will experience the next level of high speed racing simulation game play just like a realistic Ostrich race. You have to ride on Ostrich very carefully and jump over all the obstacles and reach the finish line within given time. You can also speed up and slow down the Ostrich running speed and can balance your carriage by tilting your device. You have to maintain your Ostrich stamina till finish line.

FEATURES:
- Absolutely Free
- Beautiful, Realistic, 3D HD environment
- Unique Ostrich
- Awesome cart jumping and galloping
- Challenging Levels based on time, speed and stamina
- Realistic obstacles like wooden crates, barrels, wood logs, trees and hurdles
- Multiple Camera Views during the race day
- Variety of Ostrich stables and saddle
- Realistic riders
- Intuitive tile controls to steer your Ostrich
- AI wild Ostrich opponents
- Many fulfilled 3D race missions and chapters
- Full Action packed music and sound effects
- Career mode vs Training mode
- Realistic Controls
- Realistic animations of cart race towards the finishing line
- Easy to play
- No Internet required
- No In-App Purchases
